dataList.name: Snake Slough
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all allies gain 2 [DefenseUp].
Each ally gains ([DefenseUp] on self / 4) Offense Level. (max 10)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain [DefenseUp] and Offense Level

dataList.name: Snake Slough+
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all allies gain 4 [DefenseUp].
Each ally gains ([DefenseUp] on self / 3) Offense Level. (max 10)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain [DefenseUp] and Offense Level

dataList.name: Snake Slough++
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all allies gain 4 [DefenseUp].
Each ally gains ([DefenseUp] on self / 2) Offense Level. (max 10)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain [DefenseUp] and Offense Level

dataList.name: False Halo
dataList.desc:
On Hit, gain 1 [Zazen]. (2 times per Skill)
If this unit was hit by an enemy Skill this turn, gain +1 more [Zazen] each time.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: On Hit, gain 1 [Zazen]

dataList.name: False Halo+
dataList.desc:
On Hit, gain 1 [Zazen]. (3 times per Skill)
If this unit was hit by an enemy Skill this turn, gain +1 more [Zazen] each time.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: On Hit, gain 1 [Zazen]

dataList.name: False Halo++
dataList.desc:
On Hit, gain 2 [Zazen]. (3 times per Skill)
If this unit was hit by an enemy Skill this turn, gain +1 more [Zazen] each time.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: On Hit, gain 2 [Zazen]

dataList.name: Metronome
dataList.desc: In odd-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [AttackDmgUp]. In even-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [Protection].

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Enhance allies' attack or defense based on the turn number

dataList.name: Metronome+
dataList.desc: In odd-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [AttackDmgUp]. In even-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [Protection] and 1 [DefenseUp].

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Enhance allies' attack or defense based on the turn number

dataList.name: Metronome++
dataList.desc: In odd-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [AttackDmgUp] and 1 [AttackUp]. In even-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [Protection] and 1 [DefenseUp].

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Enhance allies' attack or defense based on the turn number

dataList.name: Bridle
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: all allies gain (current Floor x 2)% max HP (max 20%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain max HP based on the current Floor

dataList.name: Bridle+
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: all allies gain (current Floor x 3)% max HP (max 30%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain max HP based on the current Floor

dataList.name: Bridle++
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: all allies gain (current Floor x 5)% max HP (max 50%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain max HP based on the current Floor

dataList.name: Contempt of the Gaze of Contempt
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #6 Deployed Identity]

Combat Start: deal +10% more damage for every enemy Attack Skill targeting this unit (max 20%)

Combat Start: when targeted by 2+ Attack Skills, deal (# of Skills targeting this unit) fixed HP & SP damage against all enemies targeting this unit. (max 3; this effect does not hurt allies)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more damage based on # of enemy Skills targeting this unit; deals fixed damage

dataList.name: Contempt of the Gaze of Contempt+
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #6 Deployed Identity]

Combat Start: deal +10% more damage for every enemy Attack Skill targeting this unit (max 20%)

Combat Start: when targeted by 2+ Attack Skills, deal (# of Skills targeting this unit x 2) fixed HP & SP damage against all enemies targeting this unit. (max 5; this effect does not hurt allies)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more damage based on # of enemy Skills targeting this unit; deals fixed damage

dataList.name: Contempt of the Gaze of Contempt++
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #1 and #6 Deployed Identities]

Combat Start: deal +10% more damage for every enemy Attack Skill targeting this unit (max 30%)

Combat Start: when targeted by 2+ Attack Skills, deal (# of Skills targeting this unit x 2) fixed HP & SP damage against all enemies targeting this unit. (max 10; this effect does not hurt allies)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more damage based on # of enemy Skills targeting this unit; deals fixed damage

dataList.name: Unhatched Embers
dataList.desc: When taking mortal damage, fix HP to 1 for the attack; After Attack, heal 20% of max HP. (once per Encounter)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When taking mortal damage, defy death and heal HP

dataList.name: Unhatched Embers+
dataList.desc:
When taking mortal damage, fix HP to 1 for the attack; After Attack, heal 20% of max HP. (once per Encounter)

If the affect unit has [Combustion]: fix HP to 1 for the attack; After Attack, heal 30% of max HP instead. (once per Encounter for both this and the above effect)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When taking mortal damage, defy death and heal HP

dataList.name: Unhatched Embers++
dataList.desc:
When taking mortal damage, fix HP to 1 for the attack; After Attack, heal 20% of max HP. (once per Encounter)

If the affect unit has [Combustion]: fix HP to 1 for the attack; After Attack, heal 40% of max HP instead. (once per Encounter for both this and the above effect)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When taking mortal damage, defy death and heal HP

dataList.name: Anti-Ovine Grounding Plug
dataList.desc: When hit during the combat phase, inflict 1 [Paralysis] against the attacker next turn. (Once per turn for each character)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When hit, inflict 1 [Paralysis] next turn

dataList.name: Anti-Ovine Grounding Plug+
dataList.desc:
When hit during the combat phase, inflict 1 [Paralysis] against the attacker next turn. (Once per turn for each character)

At 5+ Envy A-Reson., at Combat Start: inflict 1 [Paralysis] against all enemies.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Combat Start: when hit, inflict 1 [Paralysis] next turn

dataList.name: Vestiges of the King
dataList.desc: Chain Battles) Starting from #7 Deployed Sinner, at the start of the same turn it Substitutes in, heal 10 SP, gain 2 [ParryingResultUp], and gain 1 E.G.O resource for each one of their Skills 1, 2, and 3

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal SP, gain Clash Power Up, and E.G.O resources when substituting in
